text: Freaky Friday is a 1976 American fantasy comedy movie starring Jodie Foster and Barbara Harris as a teenage daughter and her mother who switch bodies. It is based on a novel of the same name by Mary Rodgers.Ansen, David. Excerpt of "Mom is Teen for a Day". Newsweek, August 18, 2003. Retrieved 6/20/10. It was remade in 1995 and in 2003. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1976 comedy movies Category:1970s teen movies Category:American fantasy movies Category:American teen comedy movies Category:Body swapping in fiction Category:1970s English-language movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Disney movies
title: Freaky Friday (1976 movie)
